channel.title: War Thunder
channel.description:
If anyone is into World War 2 MMO's this is the game for you. It's an aviation based game that's really addicting. I myself have a fascination for history and world war 1 and world war 2 aviation happens to be one of my favorites. Give it a try some time it's addicting. Client is a 5gb download but it's well worth it!
http://warthunder.com/
Some screen shots: http://www.f2p.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/War-Thunder-screenshot-45.jpg http://www.f2p.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/War-Thunder-screenshot-31.jpg http://www.mmoreviews.com/imgs/War-Thunder-profile-RW1.jpg http://www.mmoden.com/wp-content/uploads/war-thunder-gameplay-review-screenshots-8.jpg
Give it a try guys!
